description: As we're sure you can tell, Trystan loves working out. And with working out comes tense muscles. Tense muscles like to be rubbed and massaged. That's where Marko Lebeau come in. He's got very strong hands and he's a certified masseur, so Trystan's pain's won't be a problem. There's just one thing...sometimes when Marko is giving a stud a deep rub down, he gets turned on. He's a straight guy, but there's just something about feeling rippling muscles in his handles that gets him going. Fortunately, Trystan doesn't mind a good cock sucking. So after the deep tissue rub, Trystan gets a mind numbing blowjob from his new buddy.Enjoy!
title: The Masseur
